Great Basin links to the Arctic over the Holocene. Comparison of ( A) unfiltered Leviathan Î´ 18O ivc and ( B) insolation, ( C) fossil tree radiocarbon dates at the Russian treeline
32 , ( D) pollen-based summer temperature anomalies in the Western Canadian Arctic
31 , ( E) and melt layer percentage in the Agassiz ice cap
30 shows an orbital-scale control on Holocene Arctic and Great Basin paleotemperature. YD indicates the Younger Dryas chronozone.
